channel.description: Recent content in runtime on Morgoth

item.title: CRI
item.description: CRI CRI: Container Runtime Intarface 定义了k8s和container runtime进行交互的接口. 是k8s与container交互的标准. containerd docker. https://github.com/containerd/containerd CRI-O redhat. https://github.com/cri-o/cri-o kata https://github.com/kata-containers/runtime rkt redhat(coreos) https://github.com/rkt/rkt
